title: Umm Perma Ban
body:
Umm
i was permanently banned with out any reason. I was just wondering about what i was banned for. Their was one time when my account was hacked but that was too long ago. I just recently hit lvl 30 and i came on on the 28 of april and found my account was perma banned HELP PLEASEEEEEEEEE


What did i do?
Was it afking, {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
was i hacked AGAIN???{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

I dont know  
just please give me a reason.
I Just Want My Account Back.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should've received an email to your registered email address with details about the ban.

If you did not then you'll have to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for information regarding your ban as they're the only ones who can assist with account-related issues.
